column2: located in the montrose area.  They are a boulangerie and patisserie
column3: meaning they specialize on pastries and breads.  Parking is a pain
column4: the weekends are usually a sh1t show (super packed).  they do have some outdoor seating.  High quality baked goods
column6: and solid lunch/brunch menu as well.  Best times to go are probably weekday lunch to avoid the masses
